aliases: The Island That Walks Like A Man
content: Recruiting a new band of X-Men, Cyclops returned and defeated the island. Polaris caused a magnetic pulse from the Earth that was so powerful it shot Krakoa into space.
powers: Krakoa was a living ecosystem. It had control over all of the elements and geographical formations attached to it, and was able to sap the power out of mutants if they remained on the island too long. Krakoa also had immense psi powers.
